title: About me
text:
I love finding out the source of any information that I heard of. I only believe in information that is backed by concrete research evidence and sound journalism. I am learning to be aware of the possible caveats of a fact as well.
Having an older sister residing in the States, I’ve been introduced to the Americans’ athletic sense as well as their embrace of diversity and inclusion.
After living in the heart of Europe for more than 1 year, I have become very mindful of my consumption habits as they impact the environment, and I am now a minimalist. I also learned to overcome the prejudice I have as a Vietnamese girl and respect others despite differences.
I love meeting people from different corners of the world, seeing their perspective about life, how they think and behave because of how they were brought up.
My greatest achievement so far: I have a healthy and strong relationship with my family members.

I am still on the way to be a global citizen. To all fellow voyagers in this grand expedition called life, I extend an open invitation. Reach out, connect, let’s unravel the threads of our experiences and weave a tapestry that reflects the beauty of our collective journey!

title: Ocean-born, charting global business waters~
text:
I entered this world in Vũng Tàu, a beautiful beach city in Vietnam.
My name, Hải Triều, means “tidal waves”~
I am pursuing a Master’s in International Business Economics and Management at KU Leuven, being a world away from the tranquil shores of my homeland.
Yet, amidst the scholarly pursuits, nostalgia often sweeps over me like a tidal wave, carrying echoes of home - the vibrant chaos of the Vietnamese streets, the aroma of phở gầu wafting through the air and the laughter of family gatherings over the starlit sky.
Those memories, woven into the fabric of my being, remind me of the rich tapestry of my origins and fuel my determination to blend the wisdom of the East with the knowledge of the West.
Here, in the heart of Europe, I am not merely a student. I am an ambassador of cultural exchange, a seeker of harmony in diversity. I weave my heritage into conversations, and I am very proud of being a Vietnamese.
Each day, I stride forward, fueled by the spirit of Hải Triều - the unyielding determination to surge ahead, to shape a world where the ebb and flow of ideas create a symphony of progress for me.
Every encounter is a chance to share, to listen and to learn.

title: Work experience
text:
My goal is to get exposed to as many technical and business roles as possible.
